markdown.markdown:
Highlights of my current and past research from other sources.


Watch my [invited talk](https://media.ed.ac.uk/media/Epidemiology+Research+Group+seminar+-+Dr+Naomi+Launders+-+8th+Oct+2025/1_chfi2qit) at the Usher Institute, University of Edinburgh.

## July 2025

Data access for two of my fellowship project have been approved. Full details are on the respective websites.

The first is with the [British Heart Foundation Data Science centre](https://bhfdatasciencecentre.org/projects/ccu099/) and the second with the [UK Longitudinal Linkage Collaboration](https://ukllc.ac.uk/data-use-register/the-role-of-sociodemographic-factors-in-attendance-at-cancer-and-cardiovascular-disease-screening-and-in-delayed-cancer-diagnosis-before-during-and-after-the-covid-19-pandemic-in-people-with-severe-o).

## May 2025:

[Review of the Datamind/MQ ECR meeting](https://datamind.org.uk/unlocking-research-insights/), including my presentation on data harmonisation.

## December 2024:

Our research into multimorbidity in people with severe mental illness was referenced in [The Big Mental Health Report by MIND](https://www.mind.org.uk/media/vbbdclpi/the-big-mental-health-report-2024-mind.pdf).

## October 2024:

I authored a blog piece for the DATAMIND website: [A Researcher's Journey: How DATAMIND is Transforming Mental Health Research](https://datamind.org.uk/a-researchers-journey-how-datamind-is-transforming-mental-health-research/)

## September 2024:

I was an invited speaker at [Personalised Care Week](https://www.personalisedcareinstitute.org.uk/2024/09/11/personalised-care-week/), where the theme was: The Multimorbidity Challenge: A Personalised Care Approach.

## May 2024:

HDR UK article on the Big Data for Complex Disease fellowship programme: [Ambitious “rising stars” programme to explore cardiovascular disease, cancer and other complex conditions](https://www.hdruk.ac.uk/news/ambitious-rising-stars-programme-to-explore-cardiovascular-disease-cancer-and-other-complex-conditions/)

## January 2023:

[Mental Elf blog](https://www.nationalelfservice.net/other-health-conditions/comorbidity/severe-mental-illness-and-comorbid-chronic-physical-illness-the-clocks-ticking/) on our paper looking at severe mental illness and chronic physical health conditions.

## September 2022:

[A Lancet Psychiatry editorial](https://www.thelancet.com/journals/lanpsy/article/PIIS2215-0366(22)00276-0/fulltext) on our paper looking at the timing of physical health diagnoses in people with severe mental illness.
